abstract: Four weeks after announcing its partnership with Microsoft, Yahoo unveils improvements to its search service and other products.
snippet: Four weeks after announcing its partnership with Microsoft, Yahoo unveils improvements to its search service and other products.
lead_paragraph: For all the hoopla about its blockbuster search and advertising partnership with Microsoft, Yahoo said it planned to keep its feet firmly planted in the search business.

headline.main: Yahoo: We’re Still in the Search Business
